tagline: The dress TikTok can't stop talking about - now at pre-order prices

headlines.main: Meet The Viral Reilly Dress Everyone's Obsessed With
headlines.sub: Effortlessly elegant, endlessly versatile - from brunch to date night in one timeless piece
headlines.urgency: Pre-Order NOW: Save $40 Before This Viral Dress Sells Out Again
headlines.social_proof: Join 10,000+ Women Who Made This Their Wardrobe Essential

features: Ultra-flattering A-line silhouette that complements every body type with a feminine, flowing fit
Premium breathable fabric blend keeps you comfortable from morning coffee to evening events
Versatile design transitions seamlessly - dress it up with heels or down with sneakers
Thoughtful details including adjustable tie waist, pockets, and the perfect midi length
product_copy.care: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Hang dry or tumble dry low. Cool iron if needed. Do not bleach.
product_copy.sizing: Runs true to size. Between sizes? Size up for a relaxed fit or down for a more tailored look. Model is 5'7" wearing size S.

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.text: literally obsessed!! wore it to brunch and got SO many compliments. the fabric is chef's kiss and it has pockets hello???

testimonials.name: Emma K.
testimonials.text: ok so i saw this on my fyp and ordered immediately. best impulse purchase ever. feels expensive but its literally $19 rn

testimonials.name: Jessica L.
testimonials.text: stop scrolling and just buy it!!! wore it on a first date and he said i looked stunning. dress did all the work tbh

testimonials.name: Madison R.
testimonials.text: super cute and comfy! only thing is i wish it came in more colors but the quality is amazing for the price

testimonials.name: Taylor B.
testimonials.text: bought 2 bc i knew id live in this. perfect for texas heat and still looks put together. size up if u want it flowy

testimonials.name: Brooklyn S.
testimonials.text: my new favorite dress hands down. wore it to a wedding and ppl thought it was designer lol

testimonials.name: Olivia H.
testimonials.text: the hype is REAL. this dress makes me feel like that girl. also the tie waist is so flatering im crying

testimonials.name: Ava T.
testimonials.text: came in 3 days!! fits perfectly and the fabric doesnt wrinkle. packed it for vacation and its my go-to

testimonials.name: Chloe D.
testimonials.text: really pretty dress! the length is perfect for me at 5'6. would give 5 stars but shipping took a bit longer than expected

testimonials.name: Sophia W.
testimonials.text: tiktok made me buy it and zero regrets. ive worn it 4 times already and always get asked where its from

testimonials.name: Zoe P.
testimonials.text: this dress is everything!!! comfortable enough for all day but still looks elevated. pockets are a game changer

testimonials.name: Lily C.
testimonials.text: best $19 ive ever spent. feels like butter and photographs SO well. already planning my next 3 outfits around it

testimonials.name: Isabella G.
testimonials.text: Absolutely in love with this dress! The fit is perfection and I've gotten endless compliments. Worth every penny and then some.

testimonials.name: Mia F.
testimonials.text: This dress exceeded all my expectations. The quality is incredible and it's so versatile. Already planning to order another!

testimonials.name: Charlotte A.
testimonials.text: Finally found THE dress! Flattering, comfortable, and I can dress it up or down. This is going to be my summer staple.

testimonials.name: Amelia J.
testimonials.text: Beautiful dress and great quality! Fits true to size. Only minor thing is I wish the straps were slightly adjustable, but still love it.

testimonials.name: Harper N.
testimonials.text: This dress is a MUST HAVE! So elegant yet effortless. I wore it to dinner last night and felt like a million bucks.

testimonials.name: Evelyn M.
testimonials.text: Obsessed doesn't even cover it! The fabric drapes beautifully and the color is even prettier in person. 10/10 recommend!

testimonials.name: Abigail R.
testimonials.text: Can't believe this dress is only $19 right now! Looks and feels way more expensive. Already told all my friends about it.

testimonials.name: Emily V.
testimonials.text: The Reilly Dress is everything I wanted and more. Perfect length, flattering fit, and the pockets are such a nice touch!

testimonials.name: Grace L.
testimonials.text: Just received my Reilly Dress and I'm thrilled! The quality is outstanding and it fits beautifully. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a versatile dress.

testimonials.name: Victoria S.
testimonials.text: This dress is wonderful! Very flattering and comfortable. I'm 5'5 and the length is perfect. Great value for the price!

testimonials.name: Scarlett H.
testimonials.text: Lovely dress with nice fabric quality. Fits well and looks elegant. Only reason for 4 stars is the pre-order wait time, but it was worth it!

testimonials.name: Penelope B.
testimonials.text: Absolutely love this dress! It's become my go-to for everything from casual outings to nicer events. The tie waist is very flattering.

testimonials.name: Rachel K.
testimonials.text: Exceptional quality and customer service. The Reilly Dress arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Very impressed with the attention to detail.

testimonials.name: Amanda T.
testimonials.text: Outstanding product and great value. The dress is well-made with quality stitching and fabric. Fits true to size as advertised. Would definitely purchase from this company again.

testimonials.name: Jennifer P.
testimonials.text: Very pleased with my purchase overall. The dress quality is excellent and the fit is flattering. Delivery was slightly delayed but customer service kept me informed throughout.

testimonials.name: Michelle D.
testimonials.text: Fantastic dress! The quality exceeded my expectations and the fit is perfect. Great customer experience from ordering to delivery. Highly recommend.

testimonials.name: Lauren W.
testimonials.text: Best online clothing purchase I've made in a long time. The Reilly Dress is beautifully made, comfortable, and versatile. Worth every penny.

testimonials.name: Ashley C.
testimonials.text: Excellent quality dress at an unbeatable pre-order price. Fits true to size and the fabric is breathable and comfortable. Will be ordering more!

order_bump.name: Reilly Dress Belt - Premium Vegan Leather
bullets: Perfectly complements your Reilly Dress with an adjustable fit
Premium vegan leather in versatile gold-tone buckle finish
Instantly elevates any outfit from casual to sophisticated
Durable construction designed to last season after season
